snippet: A mother of two bought the rights to Frozen Dead Guy Days, a festival in Nederland, Colo., inspired by a corpse that has been kept on ice for going on 20 years.
abstract: Amanda MacDonald buys rights to Frozen Dead Guy Days, decade-old festival in Nederland, Colo, inspired by the corpse of Norwegian man Bredo Morstoel, which has been kept on ice for almost 20 years; next festival is expected to attract some 20,000 revelers.
lead_paragraph: A mother of two bought the rights to Frozen Dead Guy Days, a festival in Nederland, Colo., inspired by a corpse that has been kept on ice for going on 20 years.

headline.seo: Frozen Dead Guy Days, a Festival in Colorado, Stays Put
headline.main: Town Breathes Easier as Frozen Dead Guy and His Festival Stay Put
headline.print_headline: Town Breathes Easier as Frozen Dead Guy and His Festival Stay Put
